page.title: 18HOPES & FEARS IN KIRKNEWTON
page.content: People are concerned about harvest and livestocks' winter fodder because of the bad summer which has effected this year's harvest. Isolation, particularly for women is a concern. The threat of closure of Kirknewton School is a matter of great local concern,which has resulted in the formation of a local pressure group, {The Friends of Kirknewton School,}to fight closure plans. Hopes are for better transport, nursery education and a refurbished village hall. Also a{pub}and youth centre.
